dataList.desc:
Looks like we can restore one of the deactivated systems of the Safety Team, apart from the basic functionalities of the Regenerator.

Which one should we reactivate?

options.messageDesc: Select to heal HP for all allies.
result:
Regenerator Mk2 reactivated.

I can feel the Sinners' bodies rapidly regenerating.

It didn't just regenerate our wounds; it healed their fatigue or minor injuries as well.

options.messageDesc: Select to heal SP for all allies.
result:
The Mental Corruption Neutralizing Gas has been activated.

The Sinners all look noticeably more comfortable, as though their heads have been cleared.

We're now all ready to fight our next battle.

dataList.name: Education & Machine Console
dataList.desc:
We came across a containment unit as we were making our way across the hallway. Its door is letting off sparks of lightning.

Looks like the generator's shorted; the door refuses to close. But it doesn't seem like whatever Abnormality in there's escaped.

Try as we might to take a better look inside, the sheer darkness of the containment unit makes it hard to tell what's going on in there.

The webs haning from the ceiling and the suspiciously pitch-black floor were quite bizarre to behold, however.

options.messageDesc: Select to gain a Bleed E.G.O Gift
result:
Looking through the webs reveals... small spiders crawling within.

And that they were no mere spiderweb.

The darkness that devoured the floor lights up, red eyes glowing and teeming.

The little spiders notice the generator, and begin weaving their webs.

Some of them stick to the Sinners, slowly crawling up their bodies.

options.messageDesc: Select to gain a Charge E.G.O Gift
result:
Thankfully, it doesn't take much time before a malfunctioning part is identified.

We carefully removed the malfunctioning part...

... and all of a sudden, the generator stops fizzling, and the door of the containment unit slams shut.

options.message: Check the generator, but don't take your eyes off the webs.
options.messageDesc: Envy & Lust Advantage check. Pass to gain a Bleed & Charge E.G.O Gift.

dataList.name: Safety Team
dataList.desc:
Every corner of this room is filled with an emerald light.

Somebody spilled a bunch of Enkephalin on the table, enough to start slowly dripping to the floor.

'Executive Manager, we've found some Enkephalin here.'

'Mm. It will likely be helpful to our endeavors should we collect them'

'T.T.G.G.C.C?'

'"Take that glass gas canister, capiche?" ... she says...'

options.messageDesc: Select to gain a Sinking E.G.O Gift
result:
'It is a terrible strategy to mess with gas you don't know the effects of! I say that we leave the gas and take only the Enkephalin.'

'Hmph, you don't know what you're blathering about.'

'Do you not see the twisted beauty emanating from the ominous gas container?'

'Nah, lass. I don't. It's just you.'

'So, um. Wouldn't that Enkephalin also be contaminated or something?'

'Enkephalin is not a material that is so easily tainted.'

The Sinners soon split into two parties and begin arguing with one another.

Few minutes later, we found ourselves quickly making our way through the hallway with a box of Enkephalin in our hands.

options.messageDesc: Select to gain a Sinking E.G.O Gift
result:
'It is a terrible strategy to mess with gas you don't know the effects of! I say that we leave the gas and take only the Enkephalin.'

'Hmph, you don't know what you're blathering about.'

'Do you not see the twisted beauty emanating from the ominous gas container?'

'I am rather partial to the hazy levitation of the effluvium.'

'Ooho, forsooth! Yet... how shalt thou carry the intangible gas!?'

'Look, here's a button to extract the gas into a portable gas canister~'

The Sinners soon split into two parties and begin arguing with one another.

Few minutes later, we found ourselves quickly making our way through the hallway with a gas canister in our hands.

options.messageDesc: Lust & Sloth Advantage check. Pass to gain 2 Sinking E.G.O Gifts (failing begins a combat Encounter)

dataList.name: One Sin SP Healing E.G.O Gift Giveaway
dataList.desc:
A strand of light peeks through the glass and the ajar door.

Beyond the glass is a bizarre skull...

A floating skull bound by thorns to a cross, surrounded by a circular light.

The empty eye sockets of the skull gaze straight into us.

'This Abnormality's denomination is 'One Sin and Hundreds of Good Deeds.'

'Of course, it is not the same entity that once resided inside the L Corp.'

'Fathomless depths lie within the hollows of its eyes; piercing us.'

options.message: Pray before One Sin and Hundreds of Good Deeds.
options.messageDesc: Sloth & Gloom Advantage check. Pass to gain a Keywordless E.G.O Gift.

options.message: Talk to One Sin and Hundreds of Good Deeds.
options.messageDesc: Sloth & Gloom Advantage check. Pass to gain a Keywordless E.G.O Gift.

dataList.name: Heal HP, SP, or gain Cost
dataList.desc:
We look up to see white butterflies above us.

Though given wings, the butterflies wander the hallway, fluttering to nowhere.

We make our way to where it seems to rest a while, and we see a large coffin past the transparent glass window.

It was too grand for a one, yet too small for many.

'A lonesome coffin lies.'

'Eugh, a coffin...? I have a bad feeling about this. We probably shouldn't touch it, right?'

'That'd be the safer choice, yeah... but what if there's something in there that could help us?

options.message: Let's not mess with the coffin and leave.
result:
We solemnly paid our respects to the coffin past the door, then left.

Butterflies without a home dance, fluttering toward us on a shearing, cold wind.

Are they writhing out of sorrow, or are they wingbeats of lamentation? We cannot know.

A remembrance rises as I quietly observe the butterflies. That something has merely and fully returned to whence it came.

options.message: Let's see what's inside the coffin.
options.messageDesc: Select to gain a Sinking E.G.O Gift
result:
A cold cadaver of a butterfly rests silently inside the coffin.

The white butterflies, who so desperately fluttered their tiny wings in the faith that there must be something there at the end, are no more; gone, unnoticed by all.

What lies past the periphery of death, one asks. Truth be told, there is nothing, nothing at all.

dataList.name: Miracle in District 20 Hard Event 1
dataList.desc:
The factory is brightly lit with red and green light fixtures.

Amidst the chaotic din of machines and clanking tools...

... are tiny gnomes, scurrying about busily between the assembly lines.

'Let's g-ome! Hurry up-ome!!'

'Put 'em on the conveyor belt-ome!!'

'Let's get packin'-ome!!'

options.messageDesc: Run a Sloth & Gluttony Advantage check to gain a Keywordless E.G.O Gift.
result:
All kinds of fascinating gifts are piled up here.

Maybe we can rummage through it to find something that might be of help to us.

dataList.name: Miracle in District 20 Hard Event 2
dataList.desc:
An old, creaky bed sits solemnly in the middle of the room.

It is surrounded by numerous lanterns and candlesticks.

Some are burnt out, their remains ashen and cold, leaving only dark singes as testament of their old flames...

But the others were still lit, their warm flames diligently traveling down the wicks.

Yet, the chillingly dark shadows lurking at the bed's legs, next to the sheets half-sliding off the bed, are shrouded still.

An odd tremor vibrates the floor.

And soon, I hear a sound of something dragging across the floor accompanied by a sensation of a cold, clammy gaze peering intently in my direction...

What could possibly lie beneath that bed?

options.messageDesc: Run a Sloth & Gluttony Advantage check to gain a Tremor E.G.O Gift.
